column4: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A  Chinese driver in a Lexus GX470 with RCAF plates ------hit a monument of US-Cambodian friendship at  5:35 am on October 6
column6: on Chom Chao roundabout.------According to the source
column9: plated with the RCAF 2-2976 license plate
column10: was driven by the Chinese with lack of caution
column12: onto the roundabout and hitting US-Cambodia Friendship monument
column13: causing damage. No people were injured.------After the incident
column14: the local authorities turned up and the car was taken to the main traffic office of the Phnom Penh Police Commission to wait for  settlement according to the legal process.------http://tnn-news.com/archives/127379
